item.title: Need help with my ::dice
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Deadly, move your command underpublic void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {
If you move it to there, you won’t need the c.playerRights == 4
part.

item.title: Need help with my ::dice
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Actually I’m not wrong so download the source and look like I did, I wouldn’t have said it if I wasn’t sure. I have it downloaded and I went and looked. But if I’m “wrong” so be it… my method isn’t.

Donor rights is 4 and there is also a isDonator and issDonator, for donator and super donator.

EDIT: I went in and changed my rights to 4 and it made me a donator.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my ::dice
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("dice")) {
    if (c.playerRights == 0 || c.inWild())
        return;
    c.forcedText = "[" + c.playerName + "] just rolled " + Misc.random(100) + " on the dice!";
    c.updateRequired = c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
}

item.title: Need help with my ::dice
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Hey guys, i wan’t to stop players from using ::dice command and make it only for donor. I use deathlypvpz v4 (PI_317). Here is the ::dice command

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("dice")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("Er, it's not to smart to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } if (c.playerRights == 0) { c.forcedText = "I'm Not A Donor+, So Im Not Legit Enough to dice!"; c.sendMessage("You Must Donate to be A Legit Dicer"); } c.forcedText = "["+ c.playerName +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
